title: Arumukhan pEraruLai
sahitya:
Arumukhan pEraruLaik-kOrip-peralAm vArum


anupallavi

  Ariru karam kUsAdu vAri vazhangi OyAda sIruDan ippArinil ArupaDai vIDamaru


caraNam    kAriruL pOla shUzhum kavalaiyil vIzhumpOdu sOrum uLLam emadu shOdanaiyil AzhumpOdu
yAriDam aNugittuNai kOruvadenr-ayarAdu kAruNya svarUpanAi kunrelAm ninriDum
